original_text: But Peter said, “Ananias, why has Satan filled your heart to lie to the Holy Spirit and to keep back for yourself part of the proceeds of the land?
korean_text: 베드로가 이르되 아나니아야 어찌하여 사탄이 네 마음에 가득하여 네가 성령을 속이고 땅 값 얼마를 감추었느냐

sentences.original_text: why has Satan filled your heart
sentences.korean_translation: 어찌하여 사탄이 네 마음을 가득 채웠느냐

sentences.original_text: to lie to the Holy Spirit
and to keep back for yourself
part of the proceeds of the land?
